simplenlg.realiser
Class TextSpec

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.realiser.Spec
      simplenlg.realiser.TextSpec

public class TextSpec
extends Spec

simplenlg.TextSpec represents a text specification.

This follows the terminology of Reiter and Dale (2000).

A TextSpec is a tree. It consists of

  • A list of children (which can be TextSpec or PhraseSpec)
  • A document structure level (eg, sentence)
  • A list conjunct

If listConjunct is specified, it is inserted before the last child, and commas are added before other children if this is below sentence level. If listConjunct is not specified, it will be forced to "and" if this the TextSpec is sentence level or below

Author:
ereiter adapted by fhielkema December 2006
